Class Flight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Flight
public class Flight extends Object
Represents a flight in the booking system. Manages flight details, passengers, and capacity.
Author:
M9

  • Constructor Details

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int capacity, double price)
      Constructs a Flight with specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - unique flight identifier
      flightNumber - the flight number
      origin - departure city
      destination - arrival city
      departureDate - date of departure
      capacity - maximum number of passengers
      price - base price for the flight

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate)
      Constructs a Flight with default capacity and price.
      Parameters:
      id - unique flight identifier
      flightNumber - the flight number
      origin - departure city
      destination - arrival city
      departureDate - date of departure

    • getDetailsLongNoPassengers

      public String getDetailsLongNoPassengers()
      Gets detailed flight information without passenger list. Used for customer-facing views where passenger privacy is important.
      Returns:
      detailed flight information without passenger list

    • getDetailsLong

      public String getDetailsLong()
      Gets detailed flight information.
      Returns:
      detailed flight information

    • addPassenger

      public void addPassenger(Customer passenger) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a passenger to the flight.
      Parameters:
      passenger - the passenger to add
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if flight is at full capacity

    • removePassenger

      public void removePassenger(Customer passenger)
      Removes a passenger from the flight.
      Parameters:
      passenger - the passenger to remove

    • hasDeparted

      public boolean hasDeparted(LocalDate systemDate)
      Checks if flight has departed based on system date.
      Parameters:
      systemDate - the current system date
      Returns:
      true if flight has departed, false otherwise

    • calculateDynamicPrice

      public double calculateDynamicPrice(LocalDate bookingDate)
      Calculates dynamic pricing for this flight based on booking date, days until departure, and capacity. The price increases as: - The departure date approaches (urgency factor) - The flight fills up (capacity factor)
      Parameters:
      bookingDate - the date when booking is being made
      Returns:
      the dynamically calculated price
